sysevent_email_template.message_html:
Dear ${candidate.name},

I am pleased to inform you that your profile have been short-listed for the Job Specification: ${acquisition.job_specification.name}.

you will be notified once the interview will be scheduled.

The interview is likely to last around forty-five minutes. In the event that you are unable to attend in person, please inform me as soon as possible in order that alternative arrangements for your interview may be made.

Best Regards

Hiring Manager.
sysevent_email_template.name: Short Listed Template
sysevent_email_template.subject: Shortlisted For : ${acquisition.job_specification.name}
